showScoreExcerpt:
Advertised as “a love letter to New York”, the show was exactly that. It is hard to connect with a love letter that is written to someone else; it struck “a major chord” in the hearts of New Yorkers. I found New York, New York dazzling and enchanting. I thoroughly enjoyed the little moments created by the ensemble, and the snapshots of diverse lifestyles and challenges that have nothing to do with each other yet coexist.
